ygData.msgSnippet: Charm is not a once in a while mem song for me, I ve always got it memmed no matter where i go, its often a life saver while you haul to the zone.  bad train
ygData.messageBody:
Charm is not a once in a while mem song for me, I've always got it memmed no
matter where i go, its often a life saver while you haul to the zone. bad
train or something, cant mez em all? gotta run but too much stuff pounding
on ya, charm one and let it get some aggro while you bail out. fighting in
KAel is our only CC too. I've got it memmed almost always, very little
times I dont have it memmed, though I'm sure that will change once I hit
more mobs that are 55+.

Minkin

-----Original Message-----
From: Christopher Sanders [mailto:christopher.sanders@...]
Sent: July 26, 2001 3:28 PM
To: 'eqbards@yahoogroups.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Bard Mana???


Hehe..don't ya love it..just when you think you have it figured out. :)

Others may have the details, but, some of our bardic charming abilities were
deemed pretty strong (or overpowered, if you please). Therefore, instead of
changing the strength of the song, they made it so it uses mana. 6 of one,
half dozen of the other. End result, bards need mana for these songs. Keep
in mind, manasong, clarity, and other mana regen ... things ... have no
impact on the bards mana regen.

That's how I know things to be now. If anyone has further corrections or
clarifications, feel free to correct me, just don't berate me. :P

Personally...I'm not going to invest much for int, just for one song. It'll
be nice to know I've got it to use a couple times, but it's only gonna be
one of those, uh-oh, chanter died, kind of things...I hope. Hehe...I
dunno...that's how I picture it. I could be wrong. /sigh I'll shutup now.
:)

Atonal
